caption: We enjoy eating out. Last night we came to this magnificent restaurant which friends recommended to us. We had a beautiful time there with first-rate meal and an efficient stuff and a great chief cook. We put this restaurant in our list  and we shall surely visit again soon.  Highly recommended.

This was the most disappointing bowls of ramen I’ve ever had. I ordered the black garlic tonkotsu spicy with an egg. The broth was bland, it was t spicy at all, the egg was over cooked and cold, 1 piece of pork, and way too much filler ingredients. The bowl was so full of the filler ingredients (mushrooms,sesame seeds, sprouts etc) you could hardly get any broth. They served it with a regular spoon, so that didn’t help. And it wasn’t hot! I prefer my food pipping hot it was warm. For $20 it is not worth it

SO good. I’ve tried a lot of ramen spots from around the world, including Japan, and Mr Taka Ramen ranks very, very high on my list. It almost dethrones my favorite ramen restaurant because it is that good. Also, it’s reasonably priced compared to the other vendors at Time Out Market. A win-win eat!
Decent ramen but bit expensive to try in timeout market.
